metadata.name: Bhandenza
metadata.description:
'Bhandenza'. This piece draws inspiration from the famous Fidenza paintings, and I used a similar colour palette to create it. It took a lot of time and effort to master this perspective, but I am delighted with the result.

In the future, I will be adding more perspective art pieces to my collection, "Ode to Perspectives."

I am grateful for the support of Zo Studio in creating this piece, and it is being curated as part of the 'Genesis with Zo' World on Foundation.
